post.body: We had miraculous sunshine 2day after many days of rain/clouds! I FIND miracles daily. If UR unhappy, you may see miracles as MEREacles.
It just occurred 2 me that the biggest part of "twitter" is "twit." :) We CAN choose 2 see the 'wit' instead. What you see is what you get.
David Simon said, "We are beings of light in a vast universe of light." Darkness can't exist where there is light so Rise to Shine in 2009!
Happy T-giving day to my US friends! I say, "Being grateful makes us GREATful." Turkey & all the fixin's would hit the spot right now...
I just earned a passive bonus income of $600 US (which becomes more converted to Canadian dollars) through my P1D business. Life is good!
WHAT RECESSION? MY world is as I ALONE create it and I am vamping things up while so many others make the mistake of doing 'recess.'
The biggest part of, 'trust' is, 'rust.' If one only sees the 'rust,' one won't ever see the 'us.' Perception makes all the difference.
11 yr. old Jerry from China told me Thu, "I don't speak girls. I speak boys." So funny. Good luck Jerry. There's always Buddhism.
If we choose to use excuses, we choose to excuse ourselves out of living the extraordinary and into living the ordinary.
